title: Weary Traveler
description: A great battle is being fought between good and evil, in the world and in the unseen realm. But where do we stand? How are we able to fight with a supernatural being who is not visible to the eye?This book gives a perspective of our daily spiritual combat.It is set on the exotic island of Zanzibar which attracts droves of tourists from around the world every year. The stunning, white-sand beaches, the bright blue and turquoise waters, and the warm tropical weather are all pleasing to the eye and rejuvenating for the soul. But mostly unbeknownst to the people who visit, is what the locals have known for agesâ€¦there are supernatural forces at play on the island.Will one priest, pulled out of his comfort zone in the U.S., be able to help fight this battle and get the people out of the clutches of the Prince of Darkness? Can humanity win this warfare?
author: S.R. De Costa
